text: Ithi, “siyakholwa kuMvelinqangi nakulokho okwembulwa kuthina nakulokho okwembulwa ku-Abrahamu no-Ishmayeli no-Isaki noJakobe nezizwe futhi nakulokho okwanikezwa uMose noJesu nabaphrofethi abavela eNkosini yabo, asilwenzi ubandlululo phakathi kwanoma ngabe yimuphi kubona futhi sizinikele kuyena”
